Assumes initial conditions have been substituted already.

strike_goldd_simplified.format_to_matlab(mat_row)¶

For backend testing only. Do not run.

strike_goldd_simplified.get_nd(h, x, p)¶
strike_goldd_simplified.get_terms(f)¶

Supporting function for make_group. Extracts all terms in an expression.

strike_goldd_simplified.iterative_decomp(x, p, f, h, u, ics, decomp=[])¶

Iterates across groups and updates accordingly.

strike_goldd_simplified.make_group(h, x, p, u, f, ics, group, found)¶

Creates submodels(groups). States and parameters in found will not be included in the unknowns for analysis.

strike_goldd_simplified.strike_goldd(*args, **kwargs)¶
strike_goldd_simplified.strike_group(x, p, f, h, u, ics)¶

Core algorithm. Edit with extreme caution. Builds Oi and checks rank. Adds a Lie derivative if necessary and checks rank again. Note that the current implementation always uses decomp=False.

strike_goldd_simplified.t(*funcs)¶
strike_goldd_simplified.timethis(message)¶
